Hi,

Just a quickie then...

skitherock wrote:
>
> The problem is that when I try to compile the above code, I get the
> error: "An object reference is required for the nonstatic field,
> method, or property
> 'SharpNeatLibExperiments.INetworkEvaluator.ExtractNetworkPerformance(SharpNeatLib.NeuralNetwork.INetwork)'(CS0120)
>   

Yep you are calling ExtractNetworkPerformance on the interface itself 
which only contains static methods and properties. What you need is an 
actual object that implements that interface. You probably already 
created such an object inside your IExperiment class, you probably just 
need to keep a reference to that available somewhere.

Sorry I can't reply in more detail right now as I'm off to work!

Colin.
